channel.title: Can't access instance after launching from AMI
channel.description: Following your tutorial [here](https://redash.io/help/open-source/setup#setup-redash-instance-setup), I'm able to set up the pre-baked AMI on a t2.small type but am not able to access the public IPs (either the IP address or the DNS). Getting "ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED". I first tried us-west-2, now in us-west-1 but both not working. The associated security group is open to all IPs on port 80 (HTTP) and 443 (HTTPS). Have read through the other posts here but haven't been able to remedy yet. Any advice is much appreciated!

item.title: Can't access instance after launching from AMI
item.dc:creator: prasanna-kilofarms
item.description:
HI, try checking whether Docker is up and running

Read full topic
item.source: Can't access instance after launching from AMI

item.title: Can't access instance after launching from AMI

item.description:
Following your tutorial here, I’m able to set up the pre-baked AMI on a t2.small type but am not able to access the public IPs (either the IP address or the DNS). Getting “ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED”. I first tried us-west-2, now in us-west-1 but both not working. The associated security group is open to all IPs on port 80 (HTTP) and 443 (HTTPS). Have read through the other posts here but haven’t been able to remedy yet. Any advice is much appreciated!
